entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
